project.name: OSMaPaaralan
project.description: Mapping Philippine public schools (paaralan) in OpenStreetMap

tags.description: The primary tag for all items mapped in the project
The official DepEd reference id for the school
The historical DepEd reference id for the school. (e.g. after a school is merged or upgraded)
The official name of the school
The historical name of the school
The abbreviated name of the school
The alternative name(s) of the school
identify the level of education offered by a school based on the ISCED (International Standard Classification of Education) scale
The local school division office of the Department of Educatoin with supervising authority over the school
The type of operator=* for a feature, and set to 'public' for all project items.
School population data for CY 2012
School population data for CY 2015
The date the school started operating
The data source
The name of the closest territorial zone (neighbourhood, hamlet, village, etc.) when addr:street information is unavailable.
The province address of the school.
The city address of the school.
The town address of the school.
The quarter address of the school.
The village address of the school.
The village address of the school.
The hamlet address of the school.
The neighbourhood address of the school.
The street name address of the school.
The secondary street address of the school (i.e. school is located on a corner)
The housenumber address of the school.
The curriculum program implemented by a school. Unused for schools implementing the general curriculum.
The specific, special curriculum program implemented by a school (e.g. special needs, culture and arts, etc.)
